content.question: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator 4 x plus 6 over denominator 5 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following defines <math alttext="g to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msup><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 over denominator 4 x plus 6 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 x plus 6 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 x over denominator 4 end fraction minus 6"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 x minus 6 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 x minus 6 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
